item.title: Gen4 Convertible Classmate PC with Moblin
item.description: Today at CeBIT, Intel introduced the 4th generation of the classmate PC, a convertible 10-inch touchscreen mini laptop powered by an Intel Atom N450 processor.

item.title: Moblin v2.1 on a Toshiba NB205 Netbook
